verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Moreover, <S%H559><s%> you shall tell the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> <S%H376><s%> 'Anyone of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of the strangers <S%H1616><s%> who live as foreigners <S%H1481><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who gives <S%H5414><s%> any of his seed <S%H2233><s%> to Molech; <S%H4432><s%> he shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death. <S%H4191><s%> The people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> him with stones. <S%H7275><s%>

I also will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that person, <S%H376><s%> and will cut him off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> because he has given <S%H5414><s%> of his seed <S%H2233><s%> to Molech, <S%H4432><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> my sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> and to profane <S%H2490><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%>

If the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> all <S%H5956><s%> hide <S%H5956><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> from that person, <S%H376><s%> when he gives <S%H5414><s%> of his seed <S%H2233><s%> to Molech, <S%H4432><s%> and don't <S%H1115><s%> put him to death; <S%H4191><s%>

then I will set <S%H7760><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that man, <S%H376><s%> and against his family, <S%H4940><s%> and will cut him off, <S%H3772><s%> and all who play the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H2181><s%> to play the prostitute with Molech, <S%H4432><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> their people. <S%H5971><s%>

<S%H5315><s%>"'The person that turns <S%H6437><s%> to <S%H413><s%> those who are mediums, <S%H3049><s%> and to <S%H310><s%> the wizards, <S%H3049><s%> to play the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, <S%H5414><s%> I will even set my face <S%H6440><s%> against that person, <S%H5315><s%> and will cut him off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>
<S%H6942><s%>"'Sanctify yourselves therefore, <S%H6918><s%> and be holy; for I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them. <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh who sanctifies you. <S%H6942><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'For everyone who curses <S%H7043><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> or his mother <S%H517><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death: <S%H4191><s%> he has cursed <S%H7043><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> or his mother; <S%H517><s%> his blood shall be upon him. <S%H1818><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'The man who commits adultery <S%H5003><s%> with another man <S%H376><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> even he who commits adultery <S%H5003><s%> with his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> the adulterer <S%H5003><s%> and the adulteress <S%H5003><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'The man who lies <S%H7901><s%> with his father <S%H1><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> has uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>'s nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> their blood shall be upon them. <S%H1818><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man lies <S%H7901><s%> with his daughter-in <S%H3618><s%>-law, both <S%H8147><s%> of them shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death: <S%H4191><s%> they have committed <S%H6213><s%> a perversion; <S%H8397><s%> their blood shall be upon them. <S%H1818><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man lies <S%H7901><s%> with a male, <S%H2145><s%> as with <S%H4904><s%> a woman, <S%H802><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them have committed <S%H6213><s%> an abomination: <S%H8441><s%> they shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> their blood shall be upon them. <S%H1818><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man takes <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> and her mother, <S%H517><s%> it is wickedness: <S%H2154><s%> they shall be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> both he and they; <S%H2154><s%> that there may be no wickedness among you. <S%H8432><s%>
<S%H376><s%>"'If a man lies <S%H5414><s%> with an animal, <S%H929><s%> he shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> and you shall kill <S%H2026><s%> the animal. <S%H929><s%>

<S%H802><s%>"'If a woman approaches <S%H7126><s%> any animal, <S%H929><s%> and lies down <S%H7250><s%> with it, <S%H2026><s%> you shall kill the woman, <S%H802><s%> and the animal: <S%H929><s%> they shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> their blood shall be upon them. <S%H1818><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man takes <S%H3947><s%> his sister, <S%H269><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>'s daughter, <S%H1323><s%> or <S%H176><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>'s daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and sees <S%H7200><s%> her nakedness, <S%H6172><s%> and she sees <S%H7200><s%> his nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> it is a shameful thing; <S%H2617><s%> and they shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the children of their people: <S%H5971><s%> he has uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his sister <S%H269><s%>'s nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> he shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man lies <S%H7901><s%> with a woman <S%H802><s%> having her monthly period, <S%H1739><s%> and uncovers <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> he has made naked <S%H6168><s%> her fountain, <S%H4726><s%> and she has uncovered <S%H6168><s%> the fountain <S%H4726><s%> of her blood: <S%H1818><s%> and both <S%H8147><s%> of them shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> their people. <S%H5971><s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your mother <S%H517><s%>'s sister, <S%H269><s%> nor of your father <S%H1><s%>'s sister; <S%H269><s%> for he has made naked <S%H6168><s%> his close relative: <S%H7607><s%> they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

If a man <S%H376><s%> lies <S%H7901><s%> with his uncle <S%H1733><s%>'s wife, he has uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his uncle <S%H1730><s%>'s nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their sin; <S%H2399><s%> they shall die <S%H4191><s%> childless. <S%H6185><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man takes <S%H3947><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> it is an impurity: <S%H5079><s%> he has uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>'s nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> they shall be childless. <S%H6185><s%>

<S%H8104><s%>"'You shall therefore keep all my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and all my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them; <S%H776><s%> that the land, where I am bringing <S%H935><s%> you to dwell, <S%H3427><s%> may not vomit you out. <S%H6958><s%>

You shall not walk <S%H3212><s%> in the customs <S%H2708><s%> of the nation, <S%H1471><s%> which I am casting out <S%H7971><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: <S%H6213><s%> for they did all these things, <S%H6973><s%> and therefore I abhorred them.

But I have said <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H3423><s%> "You shall inherit their land, <S%H127><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> it to you to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, <S%H776><s%> a land flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>" I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who has separated <S%H914><s%> you from the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>

<S%H914><s%>"'You shall therefore make a distinction between the clean <S%H2889><s%> animal <S%H929><s%> and the unclean, <S%H2931><s%> and between the unclean <S%H2931><s%> fowl <S%H5775><s%> and the clean: <S%H2889><s%> and you shall not make yourselves <S%H5315><s%> abominable <S%H8262><s%> by animal, <S%H929><s%> or by bird, <S%H5775><s%> or by anything with which <S%H7430><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> teems, <S%H914><s%> which I have separated from you as unclean for you. <S%H2930><s%>
You shall be holy <S%H6918><s%> to me: <S%H3068><s%> for I, Yahweh, am holy, <S%H6918><s%> and have set <S%H914><s%> you apart from the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> that you should be mine.

<S%H376><s%>"'A man or a woman <S%H802><s%> that is <S%H3588><s%> a medium, <S%H178><s%> or is a wizard, <S%H3049><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death: <S%H4191><s%> they shall stone <S%H7275><s%> them with stones; <S%H7275><s%> their blood shall be upon them. <S%H1818><s%>'"
